about_the_game:
// This DLC is outdated and the download does not work.
For the WIN7/8 compatible version of Conscious Existence please do the following after installing the main app:
  • opt into the beta branch called "win7-8-alternative": Right-click app in your library -> Properties -> Betas
  • This one has a resolution of 4096*2304px instead of 4096*4096px due to older WIN systems having an outdated "Media Foundation" framework.
  • Other min. system specs still apply (also see "FAQ Solutions" thread in discussion section for infos).
